msg: Closes GH-0040 coordinator rerun doesn't consider empty output-event

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0054 Implement better way of managing test users in unit tests
According to the Hadoop development team, UserGroupInformation.createUserForTesting
is a proper way of setting up test users for the purposes of unit testing.

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH0054 making getTestUserX look like getOozieUser
They will need to be utilized in static void setUpEmbeddedHadoop

author: kamrul
msg: Adding K principal rule injection to BaseJobsServlet

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0024 leverage Hadoop rules for JT/NN Kerberos principal resolution
Currently Oozie requires the JT and NN kerberos principals to be in the WF job
Hadoop has built in rules to create these principals (i.e. mapred/_HOST@${local.realm}).
Oozie should leverage those rules if the WF job properties do not include JT/NN kerberos
principals thus not requiring them as mandatory WF job properties on WF submission.
